E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, we're in debt to the kid and his uncle and he's got the ear of one of the most powerful families in the city.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~喂，我们欠这个小鬼和他叔叔钱，而他在城里的五大家族之一里也说得上话。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Now these fucks want to liscense a massacre site.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~待会儿变屠宰场了还申请个屁执照啊。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Check up ahead, Luis. For me. Please.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~去前面看看，Luis。帮我一次，求你了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Well we're not heading out for dim sum. Rocco's asked us to talk to someone.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~其实不是去吃点心的。Rocco让我们去找某人谈谈。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I got this gun for you, Luis. It helps to be prepared.
~z~Take this gun, Luis. Just in case.
~z~Hey, you guys want to join us maybe for uh,
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，想不想和我们一起来点，呃...

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I apologize for our associate's uncouth manner.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我为那位客户的无礼冒犯道歉。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, something came up, T. That's it. I'll stop by soon, okay?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，突然有急事，T。就是这样。我很快会来一趟，好吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Can you take a look at the floor below, Lou? I'm having a fit here.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你能先去楼下看看情况吗，Lou？我正在气头上。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, absolutely, T. You've done such a great job so far.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~对对对，T。你那些决策真是英明神武啊。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Oh shit, what's happening in front? I can't bear it.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~哦，妈的，前面什么情况？我受不了了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hmm. Perhaps not. Now, I bid you farewell, sir.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~嗯...我看不一定。那么，我先告辞了，先生。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~That mean the debt's mine, too? You can keep it.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~那债也得我来还喽？你自己留着吧。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Ha! That's right, I forgot. You little yellow people are commies too, huh?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~哈！还有这茬，我都忘了。你们这帮小黄人还是共党，嗯？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I can see how dealing with a third in short pants may have pushed him over the edge. I'm feeling that way, too.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我看Rocco也是被这个穿短裤的第三世界刁民逼疯了。我能理解他了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~As you can see we are already behind schedule on this project. We need you to...
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~如你所见，我们的项目进度已经落后于计划了。需要你们去...

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Whatever, bro. Just tell me where the money from the clubs goes every week.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~随便了，老兄。你就告诉我每周赚来的钱都去哪儿了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Yo, we prepared for the apocalypse with this shit, Tony. This is hardcore.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~哟，天塌下来才用得着这个吧，Tony。这枪太硬核了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Head down these stairs, Lou. I need to rest a moment.
~z~Okay good. Good seeing you. Take care, huh?
~z~Ah, we'd love to, but we've got to go deal with some business.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~啊，我们也想啊，不过我们还有事要忙。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~A system that's flaws are becoming increasingly evident.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~而这一体制的缺陷也变得愈发明显。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, about that. Rocco has a tendency to promise more than he can deliver.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~对了，说到这个，Rocco总是倾向做一些他无法实现的保证。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Ah. Notorious, maybe. This is Luis Lopez, my business partner.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~啊，应该是臭名昭著吧。这是Luis Lopez，我的合伙人。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Don't ask me how much the Ancellottis are taking. The staff are lucky they get a pay check!
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~更别问我要还Ancelotti家族多少。还发得起工资就不错了！

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~His guys are coming! They heard that shot.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~他的人来了！他们听到枪响了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, you need to look after yourself.
~z~What are you waiting for? We're gonna die.
~z~I've done a lot of dumb things in my life, Luis, but none of them were dumber than borrowing from those pricks.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我这辈子干了不少蠢事，Luis，但最蠢的一件就是向这些混蛋借钱。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Me? You're the one keeping the male beauty queen.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我？明明你才是一直一副男美人的样子。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You won't leave the house. All for a fucking egg roll? Ay Dios mio.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~平常家门都不出，现在出来吃春卷了？老天。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~That's how you treat your admirers, ain't it?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~这就是你对待追求者的方式，不是吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You know, I grew up watching your kind getting killed on the TV - hell of a show.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~知道吗，我从小就在电视上看你们这帮人被杀。贼他妈带感。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Please, you must be the famous Tony Prince.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~幸会，你一定就是著名的Tony Prince了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Ummm. What's up ahead? I can't look.
~z~Oh yeah? That moron pal of yours. After what happened at the driving range? We still owe that pimply fuck?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~是吗？你那白痴朋友啊。上次高尔夫球场的事还不够吗？还欠那个粉刺傻逼钱哪？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~It goes on our debts. We're paying the bank. We're paying that midget, Mori.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~都拿去还债了。我们欠银行钱，还欠那个矮子Mori钱。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~We got enough trouble keeping the licenses on our own clubs. Okay? We don't do licenses.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~光是要保住自家夜店的执照就够麻烦了，好吗？办证别找我们。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Don't take that shit, T. I'm serious.
~z~I can only say that our partnership with him is one of necessity, not volition.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~只能说和他的合作是形势所迫，并非我愿。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~And I wouldn't travel to that side of the pond any time soon. If you were thinking about it.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~以后我也不可能去大洋的另一边。你就别想了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~We were dumb enough to walk into the death trap for the kid. I doubt we're gonna pull brains out of our asses now.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我们都蠢到因为那小鬼走进死亡陷阱了。就这脑袋长屁股上的水平还动脑？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~They're coming now! Why couldn't we play along?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~他们来了！刚才糊弄一下多好？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I'm soaked through. I must have lost three pounds in sweat.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我浑身湿透了。我得流了三斤的汗。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Of course. Of course. My business partner, Mr. Lopez.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~当然。当然。这是我的合伙人，Lopez先生。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~There's something I gotta take care of.
~z~What you take me for, T? I'm a gentleman.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你把我当什么了，T？我可是绅士。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Before I was being polite, Mr. Lopez, but I do not have to be.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~之前我很礼貌，Lopez先生，但我不必如此。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Really, Tone, because you done some real dumb things. I mean, you're still going out with Evan.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~是吗，Tone？比这更蠢的事你也干过吧。我是说，你还在和Evan约会。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You think it's easy keeping you in the manner to which you've been accustomed?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你以为让你每天都能这副模样抛头露面很容易吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Mr. Pelosi made it clear that you are not in a position to choose who you help and who you do not.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~Pelosi先生说得很明确，以你们现在的处境，根本没有资格选择要帮助谁。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, well, that kid's got a big mouth, okay? And he ain't in no position to be writing checks for us. Okay?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~那小子说啥你就信啥是吧？他可没资格替我们开支票。懂不？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Just in case? Yo, this is some sci-fi shit.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~以防万一？哟，这枪太科幻了吧。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Didn't I tell you? Shit, London ain't happening.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我没和你说过吗？操，不会有伦敦了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Take a guess - another job for that Rocco.
~z~We shoulda just smiled at the guy, said we'd do all we could for him, and never returned his calls.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~就该笑眯眯地答应他，说会尽力而为，然后拉黑他的电话。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~How do I put this... to 'clear things' with the Planning Department and to ease some licensing troubles.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~怎么说来着...去和规划署「解释清楚」，顺便解决我们的执照问题。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Can you see what's going on up there? Fuck. Fuck. Fuck.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你看得见上面的情况吗？操，操，操。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~They heard that shot. They're fucking coming!
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~他们听到枪声了。他们他妈来了！

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hold tight, bro. I'll look into this.
~z~That was worse than spin class. My fucking heart.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~那比动感单车还要糟糕。老子的小心脏啊。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~In that case, I guess my brother is in good hands.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~这样的话，我应该能把兄弟托付给你。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~The cocaine economy, maybe. But I don't think those guys are having problems to begin with.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~顶多引爆可卡因经济。但我看他们完全能做到这个。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~we may have saved on bullets, dry-cleaning and therapy bills.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~说不定还能省下子弹、干洗和心理治疗的费用。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, look. We're not lawyers. Okay? We run nightclubs. Pretty badly, too.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，听着。我们不是律师，好吗？我们是开夜店的，还开得很糟。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~We got to go to Dragon Heart Plaza.
~z~Move up, Lou. I can't stand this.
~z~I know a guy who gave me a deal. What can I say, it helps to be prepared.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~这个我自有门路。没什么好说的，有备无患嘛。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Leave it to me. You just concentrate on looking pretty.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~交给我吧。你只需要打扮好自己。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Personally, I blame the Oriental psychopath. He coulda taken it like a gent.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我觉得都怪那个东方神经病。怪他处事不够绅士。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~No, I'm afraid we are. There is no arrangement.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~不，我们必须走了。不会达成协议的。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You gonna call Rocco then? Rip him a new one?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你要给Rocco打电话吗？痛骂他一顿？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Oh yeah? Blissfully walking around like a douche.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~是吗？我看是无忧无虑像个小丑吧。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, what about that thing in London? That going to pull us through this?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，伦敦的事怎么样了？能靠那边撑过来吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~What is wrong with you? I was supposed to be the irrational idiot with anger issues?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你什么毛病？明明我才是那个管不住暴脾气的没头脑。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I'm gonna kill Rocco when we get out of here.
~z~That wasn't ever gonna go right. That guido better control his mouth.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~本来就不可能没事。那个意大利佬最好管住自己的嘴。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~The marketplace has a value for everything, and I guess that a disloyal Jew bastard ain't worth shit to me.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~市场经济下的一切都能明码标价，而我认为那个犹太混蛋叛徒现在一文不值。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You are not going anywhere until we have an arrangement.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~达成协议之前，你们哪儿都别想去。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~This is why I pay you to be my bodyguard!
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~这就是我付钱找你当保镖的原因！

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~If there's something that might kickstart the economy, it's that guy's spending habits.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~如果有什么能引爆经济，那就是那家伙的消费习惯。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I knew Rocco was a piece of shit.
~z~It seems the definition of family loyalty differs in your country.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~看来你我国家对家族忠诚的定义不同。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Brother or no brother. Such are the heady joys of consumer capitalism.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~是不是兄弟不重要。这就是消费资本主义的乐趣所在啊。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I don't want to think about what's up. Come on.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~哦，我都不想跟你说怎么了。走吧。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Well, if we'd tried that rather than telling the guy "no" to his face
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~真的，要是我们没有当面拒绝他，假装答应下来，

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Shit. Can you make sure it's cool down there?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~妈的。你能保证下面一切安全吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Shit, what are we hanging around for?
~z~Find a happy place. Find a happy place.
~z~The guy threatens to shoot me because I can't arrange a liquor license for him. Please give me a break, T.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~就因为我没法替他弄到售酒执照，他就拿枪威胁我。拜托，你省省吧，T。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~They're gonna get us if you wait around here.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~原地不动等着被他们干死吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I never thought we'd get out of that place.
~z~Head down to Dragon Heart in Chinatown.
~z~Mori, Mori - shit, no no, Mori. Mori no - I-I got the money, seriously. That's not the issue.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~Mori，Mori，操，不不，Mori。Mori，不，我有钱，真的。问题不在这儿。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Luis. Will you do me the honors? Fuck.
~z~Fuck, bro. Thanks for keeping me in the loop, again.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~操，老兄。谢谢你现在才告诉我经营状况。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~We are not going to be able to help you. Period. Let's go, Tone.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我们现在没有能力帮你。多说无益。我们走，Tone。
~z~好的，伙计。仅仅是因为我尊重你。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You tell me, Tone. You're the brains of the operation.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我还想问你呢，Tone。你才是行动指挥。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Give it to 'em, man. Maybe your words is gonna scare 'em off.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~和他们说去，伙计，没准真能被你的脏话吓跑。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Tony, man, we're going to Chinatown? Really?
~z~No, I just want to make you happy.
~z~They'll get me if I go down there, Luis. Please.
~z~You won't do anything, Lou. You'll play it nice. We can use this if we're smart.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你什么都不会做的，Lou。还是得笑脸相迎。动动脑筋，我们就能利用这次的事。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~He must have been weaned too early.
~z~Aiight! Let's go, I'm in the mood baby!
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~好！咱们走，我在兴头上呢，宝贝！

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~And don't do all that smack at once. On second thought...
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~记得别一次把毒品吸完了。不过转念一想...

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Does it matter? Just get us out of it.
~z~Tony! You know what you're like on the MSG. Those fuckin' headaches!
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~Tony！你知道你吃不来味精的。会头疼的。
~z~一群狗娘养的吃鸡巴的傻逼玩意。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~No, no, anything you like, just give it a think...

E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~这次不一样！那他妈是黑手党！

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Is there anything else my team can do for you?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~还有什么我的团队可以为你做的吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~We got to at least pretend to play ball.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~明面上还是要给他点面子的。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~They're gonna kill us, Luis. Get in there.
~z~Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, and if you ever want to talk about franchising this place just give me a call.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~喔喔喔喔喔喔，哪天你打算开分店了，打个电话给我。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~What have I done to deserve this?
~z~I'm supposed to know this shit, man. I'm your business partner.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你早就该跟我说的。我是你的合伙人啊。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~You never know what sells now days.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~鬼知道现在卖的是什么肉啊。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I got a feeling we ain't the only ones who'll be ripping him, Lou. God, I need my pills.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我觉得现在想骂他都得排队了，Lou。老天，我要来点药。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Mr. Pelosi has led me to expect much from this meeting.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~Pelosi先生的话让我对这次会面满怀期待。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I'm not going down there, Luis. Can you check it out?
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我不想往前走，Luis。你能去看看吗？

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, pull yourself together, Tony! We're gonna make it.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，振作起来，Tony！我们可以做到的。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~But you don't have the money, do you, Tone?
~z~You are not negotiating column inches and bar tabs, you insolent fuck!
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你们可不是在为了一点小事讨价还价，傲慢的白痴！

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Even if we did have the money to pay them back they wouldn't take it. They're gonna ride us into the ground.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~就算有钱还债，他们也不会要。他们只会慢慢把我们榨干。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I'm sure, but perhaps the show wasn't as much fun as the reality of their war.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~确实，但电视上演的可未必比现实中的战争有趣。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Can you drive me to the apartment? I need to lie down.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你能把我送回公寓吗？我得躺一会儿。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~The rent-a-guido pretending to be a gangster? Now I wish we were getting takeout.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~装做黑帮的那个意大利债主？帮他还不如去点中餐外卖呢。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Please can you check down there, Lou? Thank you, partner.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~麻烦你去看看下面，Lou。谢谢你，搭档。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Hey I don't get it, T. The clubs are making money, but we always in the shit.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我就不懂了，T。夜店明明在赚钱，但麻烦就没断过。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, don't go looking for a bright side. Rocco's big mouth nearly got us killed. Fuck! When I get a hold of him.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~是，别往好处想了。Rocco张口就来差点没害死我们。操！下次再见着他...

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I can't believe we made it out of there.
~z~It ain't that I care, it's that I can't take the moaning.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~我不是关心你，主要我受不了你的惨叫。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~I'm a wreck. Drive us to the apartment, will you?
~z~Where'd you go, Lou? Don't tell me it was a fucking booty call.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你去哪儿了，Lou？别告诉我是约炮去了。

E2T2AUD.original: ~z~If I don't make it, the clubs are yours, Luis.
~z~You got a problem? Take it up with your boy Rocco.
~z~a bit of this or a bit of that?
~z~Oh my god. Oh my god. Oh my god.
~z~Shoot me if I like seeing you walk around with a smile on your face. I wish I could be blissfully ignorant.
E2T2AUD.translated: ~z~你以为我很喜欢看你无忧无虑地笑嘻嘻乱逛吗。我还希望自己不知道这些呢。
